SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_info (nick_name, phone, password, head_url, last_login_time, create_date, address_province, address_city, address_area, open_id, token) values (#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_info set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_url = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address_province = #{addressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_city = #{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_area = #{addressArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, nick_name, phone, password, head_url, last_login_time, create_date, address_province, address_city, address_area, open_id, token from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, nick_name, phone, password, head_url, last_login_time, create_date, address_province, address_city, address_area, open_id, token from user_info
select id, nick_name, phone, password, head_url, last_login_time, create_date, address_province, address_city, address_area, open_id, token from user_info where phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
